DataShape.description: This capability allows a resource to receive bills for goods or services received at the specified billing address.
DataShape.name: PTC.Capability.BillableDataShape

FieldDefinition.description: The city of the billable resource
FieldDefinition.name: BillingCity

FieldDefinition.description: The country of the billable resource
FieldDefinition.name: BillingCountry

FieldDefinition.description: The geoposition of the billable resource
FieldDefinition.name: BillingLocation

FieldDefinition.description: The postal code of the billable resource
FieldDefinition.name: BillingPostalCode

FieldDefinition.description: The state of the billable resource
FieldDefinition.name: BillingState

FieldDefinition.description: The street address of the billable resource
FieldDefinition.name: BillingStreet
